data_task: Create a GIF of the website 'https://www.amazon.com/' with a frame rate of 10, using Apify proxy, scrolling down 20% of the viewport height, and recording 2000 milliseconds before the action.
Create a GIF of the website 'https://www.nytimes.com/' with a frame rate of 5, using Apify proxy, scrolling down 30% of the viewport height, and recording 1500 milliseconds before the action.
